items.summary: Update the centered hub logo image reference in frontend/src/components/CenteredHubLogo.tsx to use "logo2-1.png" instead of "/logo2-1.png" (path correction only). Do not change any layout, sizing, positioning, z-index layering, halo/orbit ring styling, or the existing asset rebinding behavior (the key-based unmount/remount).

Update the background silhouette logo image reference in frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhouetteLogo.tsx to use "logo2-1.png" instead of "/logo2-1.png" (path correction only). Do not change opacity, size, positioning, or any styling.
